00065     {

00075     function update_user($user_id,$uname,$passwd,$full_name,$email,$role)
00076     {
00077         if ($uname!='') $data['uname']=$uname;
00078         if ($passwd!='') $data['passwd']=md5($passwd);
00079         if ($full_name!='') $data['full_name']=$full_name;
00080         if ($email!='') $data['email']=$email;
00081         if ($role!='') $data['role']=$role;
00082

00084         $this->db->update('users',$data);

00098     function validate_user($uname,$passwd) 
00099     {
00100       $this->db->select('uname,passwd');
00101       $query = $this->db->get_where('users', 
00102                                     array('uname' => $uname) 
00103                                     );   
00104       if ($query->num_rows() > 0)
00105         {
00106           foreach ($query->result() as $row)
00107             {
00108               $db_passwd = $row->passwd;
00109               $db_uname= $row->uname;
00110               if ($db_passwd == md5($passwd))
00111                 {
00112                   return TRUE;
00113                 }
00114               else 
00115                 {
00116                   echo "passwd=".$passwd." db_passwd=".$db_passwd;
00117                   return FALSE;
00118                 }
00119             }
00120         }
00121       else 
00122         {
00123           #echo "user_id ".$uname." not found";
00124           return FALSE;
00125         }
00126     }

00150     function role_to_text($role)
00151     /* Converts a role as a number to a text string. */
00152     {
00153       switch ($role) {
00154       case 0:
00155         $roleText="Inactive";
00156         break;
00157       case 1:
00158         $roleText="User";
00159         break;
00160       case 2:
00161         $roleText="Administrator";
00162         break;
00163       default:
00164         $roleText="Unknown Role (".$role.")";
00165       }
00166       return $roleText;
00167     }

00186                 $this -> session -> userdata('logged_in') &&
